Module com.example.breakout_clone
Package com.example.breakout_clone.controller.sprite

Class PaddleController

java.lang.Object
com.example.breakout_clone.controller.sprite.SpriteController
com.example.breakout_clone.controller.sprite.PaddleController
public class PaddleController extends SpriteController
Controller class for the Paddle MVC. It sets up the connection and binds PaddleModel attributes to the PaddleView. It handles the requests to change the PaddleModel attributes.
Author:
Praket Chavan
See Also:
PaddleView, PaddleModel, SpriteController

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialises the connection between the model and view by binding the view and model properties.
      Binds the views layout X and Y property to the models X and Y location property
